usa: The United States acquired the Virgin Islands from Denmark for $25,000,000.<sup id="cite_ref-71" class="reference">[71]</sup>
The Zimmermann telegram was published, helping shift public opinion in favor of U.S. involvement in World War I.<sup id="cite_ref-72" class="reference">[72]</sup>
Puerto Rico becomes part of the United States of America.
The United States declared war on Germany, beginning the U.S.'s involvement in World War I.<sup id="cite_ref-73" class="reference">[73]</sup>
The Espionage Act was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-E&SAct_74-0" class="reference">[74]</sup>
The Lansing–Ishii Agreement was signed.<sup id="cite_ref-75" class="reference">[75]</sup>
